experience.title: Data Science Research Analyst
experience.description: Maternal and Child Health Monitoring in LMICsEstimated maternal & child health indicators in LMICs with 11945 parameters on a dataset of 59 countries by geotagged data. Performed feature scaling & outlier detection, reducing missing values by 95% and ensuring reliable data for analysis.Implemented CNNs and RNNs, leveraging the ability to capture intricate spatial & temporal patterns, achieving an accuracy of 73%. Designed robust accuracy detectors, lowering false predictions by 33% and enhancing precision and recall, Scoring 0.7 in F1.
experience.description_html: Maternal and Child Health Monitoring in LMICsEstimated maternal & child health indicators in LMICs with 11945 parameters on a dataset of 59 countries by geotagged data. Performed feature scaling & outlier detection, reducing missing values by 95% and ensuring reliable data for analysis.Implemented CNNs and RNNs, leveraging the ability to capture intricate spatial & temporal patterns, achieving an accuracy of 73%. Designed robust accuracy detectors, lowering false predictions by 33% and enhancing precision and recall, Scoring 0.7 in F1.

Secured monetary sponsorship deals from top corporates for India’s largest inter-collegiate corporate summit, Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2022.

Along with a team of 14 members, to attain partnerships worth 5.9+ Million INR for EAD-LSM 2021 & GES 2022, i.e. a 187% YoY increase, with a company portfolio including Westbridge Capital, Acer, Reliance, LTI, Capgemini, L&T and PhonePe.

Instrumental in attaining key corporate partnerships for the Entrepreneurship Cell, and media bodies with 5 million+ reach.

Conducted GES Pitchers in Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2022 which saw a massive footfall of various startups.

positions.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Working for the Corporate & Media Relations portfolio of the cell, attaining corporate associations & media partnerships for upcoming initiatives.Organised a Panel Discussion in LSM (Local Startup Meet) 2021 on the topic "Rebuilding Post-COVID: Insights and Strategies to Pivot Towards a Pandemic-Proof Business" where I invited Mr. Shashank Randev (Founder, 100X.VC), Mr. Rahul Maroli (Ex SVP - ZEE5, Ex VP - Ola), Mr. Imran Jafar (Managing Partner, Gaja Capital), Mr. Rakesh Vij (CEO, Truminds Software Systems), Mr. Sougata Basu (Founder, CashRich) and Mr. Kapil Nakra (Co-founder, Digital Vidya, and Whizlabs) to join us and give some guidance regarding entrepreneurship and share their experiences of the startup ecosystem in pre and post COVID era in front of a startup enthusiastic audience.Organized a Mentoring and Pitching Session for budding Startups in the Fintech sector where I invited Mr. Anjan Gupta (VP Morgan Stanley, Mentor of Change AIM), Mr. Sonal Saldanha (Senior Investment Associate, 3one4 Capital), Mr. Prajnyasis Biswal (Investment Team, thinQbate & Marwah Group), Mr. Kapil Banwari (CEO, Fyp), Mr. Vrajesh Panchal (Associate, BLinC Invest), Mr. Nirmal Ranga (Chief Revenue Officer, ZebPay) to join us and analyze the pitching of the startups of the fintech domain.
positions.title: Associate Member
positions.description_html:
Working for the Corporate & Media Relations portfolio of the cell, attaining corporate associations & media partnerships for upcoming initiatives.

Organised a Panel Discussion in LSM (Local Startup Meet) 2021 on the topic "Rebuilding Post-COVID: Insights and Strategies to Pivot Towards a Pandemic-Proof Business" where I invited Mr. Shashank Randev (Founder, 100X.VC), Mr. Rahul Maroli (Ex SVP - ZEE5, Ex VP - Ola), Mr. Imran Jafar (Managing Partner, Gaja Capital), Mr. Rakesh Vij (CEO, Truminds Software Systems), Mr. Sougata Basu (Founder, CashRich) and Mr. Kapil Nakra (Co-founder, Digital Vidya, and Whizlabs) to join us and give some guidance regarding entrepreneurship and share their experiences of the startup ecosystem in pre and post COVID era in front of a startup enthusiastic audience.

Organized a Mentoring and Pitching Session for budding Startups in the Fintech sector where I invited Mr. Anjan Gupta (VP Morgan Stanley, Mentor of Change AIM), Mr. Sonal Saldanha (Senior Investment Associate, 3one4 Capital), Mr. Prajnyasis Biswal (Investment Team, thinQbate & Marwah Group), Mr. Kapil Banwari (CEO, Fyp), Mr. Vrajesh Panchal (Associate, BLinC Invest), Mr. Nirmal Ranga (Chief Revenue Officer, ZebPay) to join us and analyze the pitching of the startups of the fintech domain.

projects: [{"title":"Master's Thesis - Behavioral Modeling for Urban Road Users","start_date":"Aug 2024","end_date":"Present","description":"Behavioral modeling of urban road users involves analyzing and predicting the actions of pedestrians and drivers in city environments to enhance safety and traffic efficiency. This modeling utilizes data from various sources, including real-time surveillance and advanced algorithms, to understand how different factors—such as environmental conditions, human behaviors, and road designs—affect interactions between road users."},{"title":"Maternal and Child Health Monitoring in LMICs","start_date":"May 2023","end_date":"Aug 2023","description":"This research project aims to demonstrate that machine learning in satellite imagery and other publicly available geotagged data can accurately estimate key indicators of MCH status. Our hypothesis is that the village- and neighborhood-level prevalence of child undernutrition indicators, anemia in children and women of reproductive age, child and maternal mortality, and childhood illness episodes (diarrhea, fever, and acute respiratory infections) can be accurately estimated from satellite imagery and other geotagged data. We further hypothesize that we can estimate these indicators accurately for a specific point in time as well as track changes over time."},{},{},{"title":"AI and ML Potency in Marketing Landscape: A case study","start_date":"May 2023","end_date":"Jul 2023","description":"The goal of this project is to improve and analyze marketing outcomes and key performance indicators through the use of AI and ML mediation. To identify emerging market patterns, performing in-depth analyses of market trends. Analyzing the efficiency and ROI of the implemented AI and ML strategies. My work culminated in a comprehensive report outlining various use cases, algorithm efficacy, and organizational adoption for marketing and strategy development."}]
